wikipedia_page.main: Horace Armitage was an English football player and manager who managed Galatasaray between 1908 and 1911. He also played for Fenerbahçe before going to Galatasaray SK. He was one of the founders of Cadi-Keuy.

response: In 1908 Galatasaray SK signed Horace Armitage, who had already won the league twice with Cadi Keuy FRC, as a player and as manager and the first dynasty of Galatasaray and Turkish football begun.
